articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents:
Welcome to the Massachusetts Data Science Pathways project.
This organization is for Massachusetts educators and other stakeholders focused on data science pathways from high school through two- and four- colleges and universities.
For more information please contact Nicholas Horton (Amherst College).

articles.title: Massachusetts Data Science Pathways project
articles.contents:
This website describes the Massachusetts Data Science Pathways project.
The organization is intended for Massachusetts educators and other stakeholders focused on data science pathways from high school through two- and four- colleges and universities.
To join our low volume mailing list please send an email ma-ds-pathways-join AT cs.umass.edu. The subject and body of the message will be ignored, so it doesnâ€™t matter what you provide.
